mapper.insert: insert into db_bpostseller (SID, TOKENAPI, USERNAME, 'PASSWORD', EMAIL, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, CITY, 'STATE', ZIP5, ZIP4, PHONE, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SENDNAME) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tokenapi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zip5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zip4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_bpostseller set TOKENAPI = #{tokenapi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'PASSWORD' = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STATE' = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP5 = #{zip5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZIP4 = #{zip4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SENDNAME = #{sendname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, TOKENAPI, USERNAME, 'PASSWORD', EMAIL, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, CITY, 'STATE', ZIP5, ZIP4, PHONE, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SENDNAME from db_bpostseller where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SID, TOKENAPI, USERNAME, 'PASSWORD', EMAIL, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, CITY, 'STATE', ZIP5, ZIP4, PHONE, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SENDNAME from db_bpostseller
